title: Creative Set Attached Webhook
description: Webhook payload sent by seller agent when a creative set is attached to a media buy. Informs creative agent of usage and required formats.

media_buy_id.description: The media buy this set is attached to

seller_agent_url.description: URL of the seller agent making this notification

format_ids.description: Formats required for this media buy. Creative agent may auto-build missing formats if allow_format_requests is true.

callback_url.description: URL for creative agent to notify seller of creative set changes (new creatives, updates, format builds). Subscription is active until creative-set-detached is received for this media_buy_id.
